Class WaitingRoomControllerFX

java.lang.Object
ingsw.codex_naturalis.client.view.gui.WaitingRoomControllerFX
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class WaitingRoomControllerFX extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the view of waitingRoom screen.
